Info.Title: Let Me In
Info.Writer: Matt Reeves (screenplay), John Ajvide Lindqvist (screenplay "Låt den rätte komma in"), John Ajvide Lindqvist (novel)
Info.Actors: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Chloë Grace Moretz, Richard Jenkins, Cara Buono
Info.Plot: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.
